author: Christopher Diaz
comment: It's a browser that's very buggy, but it does have potential. It takes forever for pages to load up, but it gets the job done, it does load up most pages for the most part and videos do work on pages so good job on that. But my biggest issue with this is that the "free" version is always pushing adds on you to buy the premium version of this. I ended up coughing up a few dollars to get the premium, but guess what, when you buy the premium version it doesn't save to your Google account. So if you were to reset your watch or get a new smart watch and sign in, you'd have to pay for it again! Not sure what the policies were, but I definitely feel like I shouldn't have to buy it again.

author: Kip Kyprianou
comment: I installed the app on an LG Urbane 2 watch. The app has potential and I definitely had high hopes for it. The problem I encountered is that when the keyboard comes up to enter website logon credentials it clips half of the leftmost and rightmost character of the top line. You can still type in the characters though using a stylus. When attempting to enter a password using the special characters button,  the leftmost and rightmost numbers 1 and 0, on the first keyboard line are not visible. They are totally clipped.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please let us know what keyboard you where using. We highly recommend to also test our appfour keyboard to see if this fixes the issue. Feedback and further conversions please to support@appfour.com. Thank you in advance.

author: TJay Simdorn
comment: Really love the app. Having my Twitter feed available in a pinch is great. Would love to scroll with the scroll wheel on my Fossil Q Explorist. It is really awkward being able to scroll through everything on my watch besides this app.
Buggy ad implementation makes it impossible to use. Might be good if I paid to remove ads, but the free experience is so poor, that feels like a risk and a potential waste of money!

author: Brent Hughes
comment: Terrible app in the free version.  Cannot even go to one site.  Why not just make it a paid app from the start?

author: Vlad Stangaciu
comment: You are just stupid. Making me pay to see a website make you a total di@$

reply.author: appfour
reply.content:
Creating new apps, maintaining them and offering support for our users is our Job and we strife to make our products worth the money. 
We appreciate any feedback, but we are not planning to release a free version in the near future.

author: Jd Hermawan
comment: Good application for my smartwatch, but would be great if it runs smooth or not too slow because of image download from the web. May be just like opera or something.

author: De Snoraap
comment: Can't open. Stays on a black screen.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please try reinstalling the app. If this does not solve the issue please contact our support team via support@appfour.com.

author: Iain Searcy
comment: How do I know I want it if I can't try it? Needs a demo if some kind.

author: Evan Huang
comment: Have to pay to access any website at all. Do not even bother with installing this app.

author: Connor L.
comment: Works exactly as well as you would expect a web browser to work on a 1 inch screen

author: Ali Mohammad
comment: Free version is useless
Nie

author: Mason Taylor
comment: Laggy

author: William Fong
comment: Free to purchase the Paid App version...don't bother unless you plan to buy!  01/2018  Update: Purchased the bundle for $9.99 in order to utilize this app. Works well when you need to access the web for a quick moment. The real issue for me is the Google keyboard placement is too high and the first row's first and last characters are not accessible on my round watchface. Unable to log in to certain websites due to this issue! Please resolve this with an update please.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: We will look into it. Please also check out other keyboards from the Play Store to see if this solves the issue.

author: Jack Orcherton
comment: Rubbish! Will not allow you to view the web without paying 3 pounds

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi Jack, please get in contact with our support for assistance. We will refund if there is no way to help.

author: Tech Gaming
comment: Best browser, but in browser not Showing (Word suggestions-Auto Correction.)... Plz reply your answer

author: Levi Michalski
comment: Great web service, but it kinda forced me to buy the full version. I didn't mind it because it was only a dollar though so that was pretty cool. One major complaint I have with this is it's a huge power soaker. I can use this for five minutes and drain my battery about 3%. Otherwise great app and would recommend to a friend!

author: Shelomi Diamond
comment: Utilizing the app is work as not everything fits (not quite compatible), visually incomplete,  and tricky to maneuver. Acessing buttons and features are also an obstacle. If these were solved and fixed, it would be sooo much better

author: Jacopo Frasson
comment: It does work, but the dev is a j***: accessing websites he has made a standalone app for results in being redirected to another premium purchase, separated from the already costly browser. Also, it runs really slow and often crashes. Not worth it at all. Best thing? You can't refund in app purchases, so appfour basically found a way to make this premium app not refundable. This shouldn't be allowed.

author: simon moore
comment: All I keep getting is spammy pop ups saying free version. Can't see a screen long enough to evaluate. Uninstalled the crud.

author: Kyle MacDiarmada
comment: edit: everything works after a few days   OLD Bought the unlock all package and after restoring my watch all your apps say they need me to purchase unlock. Is there a way around this? Lemme know so I can change the review.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: This is normally Google issue. Make sure the app you made the purchase with is installed on your device and reboot your smartwatch. If this does not help contact our support via support@appfour.com. Thank you.

author: clinton michaels
comment: I PAID 9.99 for the apps for android wear. But the apps are still not upgrading to the premium. I looked in Google play purchases it shows  were I  PAID 9.99. What can the developer do to fix the problem

author: NoRealName No
comment: App has literally nothing except "buy pro" message. It does not allow you to open any addresd except pre-defined four ad pages.

author: Jacob Free
comment: Lagg it has to install Everytime you open app on watch it's time consuming and a headache fix 😟 Problem

author: Carson A.
comment: Bought the bundle of apps around a year ago on my Moto 360 1st Gen. When I upgraded to the Huawei watch I no longer have he paid version. However, I did enjoy the apps when I had the Moto 360.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: The full version is bound to your account not the watch. If you have issues with google recognizing it please restart your smartwatch or contact support@appfour.com for further help. Thank you.

author: Sam Hausmann
comment: Annoying, so many hints to buy pro that I couldn't even make it so far to get opinions, that's why I deleted it...

comment: It's a pest, trying to get you to purchase full version, nothing works in free version,

comment: Top row of letters/numbers not fully accessible for entering password

comment: there is no free version it just directs you to the paid version

comment: I've already purchased 620 rupees offer pack and I bought a new phn and now it's telling to buy again what should I do?
